title: Blissfully Undone
description: Can you really blame me?I have been secretly in love of this girl for years.She's funny, easy going, with a killer smile and a body that I want to get lost in. Who am I to question fate when we get snowed in at the cabin? I have a ton of kinky things I want to try and we have the freedom to try everything together...When my friend Ryan and I agree to a true ménage à trois relationship with Jenny, our love ignites taking us on a thrilling journey of passion and love.
author: Red Phoenix
